holidays.title: National Hairstylist Mental Health Awareness Day
holidays.description: Hairstylists so often lend a friendly ear to their customers — this observation is all about offering yours in return.

holidays.title: National Sunscreen Day
holidays.description: Rub and absorb that lotion, cream, or spray before enjoying the warmth and light of summer.

holidays.title: Amateur Radio Military Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let us all get behind a mic, as it is time for ARMAD!

holidays.title: National Aaron Day
holidays.description: Let’s find out about the name Aaron, its history, popularity, and origins.

holidays.title: national asher day
holidays.description: Despite its historical and biblical origins, the name Asher wasn’t well known until the 1980s.

holidays.title: National Cellophane Tape Day
holidays.description: Time to commemorate the invention of one of the most practical things i.e., cellophane tape.

holidays.title: National Grape Popsicle Day
holidays.description: Beat the heat and tickle those taste buds with this refreshing pop.

holidays.title: National Gray Day
holidays.description: Raise your voices and spread awareness about brain cancer with our information.

holidays.title: National Italian Beef Day
holidays.description: Grab the napkins, and get your best Italian Beef Sandwich to celebrate the day in tradition.

holidays.title: National Jordan Day
holidays.description: The name Jordan is an intriguing one. This National Jordan Day, let’s find out why.

holidays.title: National Melissa Day
holidays.description: On this day, all Melissas can find out about the origin of their name.

holidays.title: National Wig Out Day
holidays.description: National Wig Out Day is a fun day where your head gets to play dress-up.

holidays.title: Nothing to Fear Day
holidays.description: Fear not; come and join us as we celebrate Nothing To Fear Day.

holidays.title: Old Time Player Piano Day
holidays.description: Old-Time Player Piano Day takes place to memorialize this unique musical instrument that plays itself.

holidays.title: Slavery Abolition Day (Guadeloupe)
holidays.description: This Slavery Abolition Day, join us as we uncover Guadeloupe’s complex history!

holidays.title: Sunscreen Protection Day
holidays.description: Making sunscreen a priority, and protecting the largest organ of the body at all costs.

holidays.title: Tracky Dack Day
holidays.description: To understand Tracky Dack Day, first, know that ‘dack’ is Australian English slang for trousers.

holidays.title: Blippi’s Birthday
holidays.description: This children’s character is loved by many and is the source of many good childhood memories.

holidays.title: Jadakiss’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper has enviable talent and the global recognition to prove it.

holidays.title: Princess Mae’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Instagram star has had a glimpse of stardom, and she’s not turning back.

holidays.title: Royalty Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: This celebrity family member has it made — with a hip-hop dad and model mom, she’s set for life!

holidays.title: Ryan Henry’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented tattoo artist and reality T.V. star, the sky really is the limit.

holidays.title: Zach Herron’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his melodious voice and dashing looks, Zach Herron has captivated the hearts of millions worldwide.
